Package com.example.fire_and_based

package com.example.fire_and_based
  • Class
    Description
    AdminActivity
    This activity hosts the EventListFragment, UserListFragment, ImageListFragment, AdminEventDetailsFragment, and AdminProfileFragment.
    AdminEventDetailsFragment
    This fragment is hosted by AdminActivity.
    AdminImagesAdapter
    This is the Adapter that allows us to swipe between tab views in the ImageListFragment.
    AdminProfileFragment
    This fragment is hosted by AdminActivity.
    Announcement
    Represents an announcement (for an event).
    AnnouncementArrayAdapter
    An ArrayAdapter for displaying announcements.
    AnnouncementService
    Service for handling announcements received via Firebase Cloud Messaging.
    AnnouncementsFragment
    This fragment is hosted by the EventDetailsFragment.
    AnnouncementUtil
    Utility class for handling announcements and notifications.
    AttendeeArrayAdapter
    This class is the adapter for the attendee list.
    AttendeeCheckedInFragment
    This fragment is hosted by the AttendeeFragment.
    AttendeeFragment
    This fragment is hosted by UserActivity.
    AttendeeListAdapter
    This is the Adapter that allows us to swipe between tab views in the AttendeeFragment.
    AttendeeListFragment
    This class is a fragment hosted by the AttendeeFragment.
    CheckedInAttendeeAdapter
    This class is the adapter for the attendee list.

    This fragment is hosted by UserActivity.
    EventDetailsFragment
    This fragment is hosted by UserActivity.
    EventListFragment
    This class is a fragment hosted by the UserActivity and/or Admin Activity It displays the list of events.

    This is the adapter for the array of events.
    EventPostersFragment
    This fragment is hosted by ImagesListFragment.
    EventTest
     
    ExampleInstrumentedTest
    Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
    ExampleUnitTest
    Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
    FirebaseUtil
    This class has all the functions for accessing the necessary data from the firebase or storing the necessary data in the firebase.
    FirebaseUtil.getAllEventsCallback
    Callback interface to get list of all events
    FirebaseUtil.getAllNonAdminUsersCallback
    Callback interface to get list of all users
